Verses: 1 yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoyaakkeem Ennum Yoodhaa Raajaavin Naalaam Varushaththile Karththaraal Eremiyaavukku Undaana Vaarththai Ennavendraal:

2 nee Oru Pusthaga Surulai Eduththu, Yosiyaavin Naatkalile Naan Unnudane Pesina Naal Mudharkondu Innaalmattum Isravelaikkuriththum, Yoodhaavaikkuriththum, Sagala Jaadhigalaik Kuriththum Unnode Sonna Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Adhile Ezhudhu.

3 yoodhaavin Kudumbaththaar, Avaravar Thangal Pollaadha Vazhiyaivittuth Thirumbumpadiyaagavum, Thangal Akkiramaththaiyum Thangal Paavaththaiyum Naan Mannikkumpadiyaagavum, Thangalukku Naan Seyya Ninaiththirukkira Theengugalaik Kuriththu Oruvelai Avargal Ketpaargal Endraar.

4 appozhudhu Eremiyaa Neriyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paarukkai Azhaiththaan; Paarukku Enbavan Karththar Eremiyaavudane Sollivandha Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Avan Vaai Solla Oru Pusthaga Surulil Ezhudhinaan.
5 pinbu Eremiyaa Paarukkai Nokki: Naan Adaikkappattavan; Naan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkul Pravesikkak Koodaadhu.

6 nee Ulle Pravesiththu, En Vaai Solla Nee Ezhudhina Surulilulla Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigalaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Ubavaasa Naalile Janangaludaiya Sevigal Ketka Vaasippadhumandri, Thangal Pattanangalilirundhu Varugira Ellaa Yoodhaa Koththiraththaarum Ketkumpadi Avaigalai Vaasippaayaaga.

7 oruvelai Avargal Karththarudaiya Mugaththukku Munbaagap Panindhu Vinnappampanni, Avaravar Thangal Pollaadha Vazhiyai Vittuth Thirumbuvaargal;karththar Indha Janaththukku Virodhamaagak Kooriyirukkira Kobamum Ukkiramum Periyadhu Endru Sonnaan.

8 appadiye Neriyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paarukku Andhap Pusthagaththil, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigalai Vaasikkumpadi Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Thanakkuk Karpiththapadiyellaam Seydhaan.

9 yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoyaakkeem Ennum Yoodhaa Raajaavin Aindhaam Varushaththu Onbadhaam Maadhaththile, Erusalemilirukkira Ellaa Janaththukkum, Yoodhaavin Pattanangalilirundhu Erusalemukku Varugira Ellaa Janaththukkum, Karththarukku Munbaaga Ubavaasam Seyyavendumendru Koorappattadhu.

10 appozhudhu Paarukku Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Merpraagaaraththil, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththu Vaasalin Nadaikku Arugaana Saappaanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Kemariyaa Ennum Sambiradhiyin Araiyile, Andhap Pusthagaththilulla Eremiyaavin Vaarththaigalai Janangal Ellaarum Ketka Vaasiththaan.
11 saappaanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Kemariyaavin Magan Migaayaa Andhap Pusthagaththilulla Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Vaasikkak Kettapodhu,

12 avan Raajaavin Aramanaikkup Poi, Sambiradhiyin Araiyil Pravesiththaan; Idho, Ange Ellaap Prabukkalum Sambiradhiyaagiya Elisaamaavum Semaayaavin Kumaaranaagiya Thelaayaavum, Akporin Kumaaranaagiya Elnaaththaanum, Saappaanin Kumaaranaagiya Kemariyaavum, Ananiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Sidhekkiyaavum, Matra Ellaap Prabukkalum Utkaarndhirundhaargal.
13 paarukku Janaththin Sevigal Ketkap Pusthagaththilullavaigalai Vaasikkaiyil, Thaan Ketta Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Migaayaa Avargalukkuth Theriviththaan.

14 appozhudhu Ellaap Prabukkalum Kooshiyin Kumaaranaagiya Selemiyaavin Maganaana Neththaaniyaavinudaiya Kumaaranaayirukkira Yegudhiyaip Paarukkinidaththil Anuppi, Janangal Ketka Nee Vaasiththukkondirundha Surulai Un Kaiyil Eduththuk Konduvaa Endru Solla Sonnaargal; Aagaiyaal, Neriyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paarukku Surulaith Than Kaiyil Eduththukkondu, Avargalidaththukku Vandhaan.
15 avargal Avanai Nokki: Nee Utkaarndhukondu, Naangal Ketka Vaasiyendraargal; Avargal Ketka Vaasiththaan.
16 appozhudhu Avargal Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Ketkaiyil Bayamutravargalaai Oruvaraiyoruvar Paarththu, Paarukkai Nokki: Indha Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Raajaavukku Nichchayamaai Arivippom Endraargal.
17 avan Vaai Solla, Nee Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Evvidhamaai Ezhudhinaai Adhai Engalukku Sol Endru Paarukkaik Kettaargal.
18 adharku Paarukku: Avar Thamadhu Vaayinaal Indha Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Uraiththu, Ennudane Sonnaar, Naan Maiyinaal Pusthagaththil Ezhudhinen Endraan.
19 appozhudhu Prabukkal Paarukkai Nokki: Neeyum Eremiyaavum Poi Oliththukkollungal; Neengal Irukkum Idaththai Oruvarum Ariyappadaadhu Endru Solli,
20 surulai Sambiradhiyaagiya Elisaamaavin Araiyile Vaiththu, Raajaavinidaththukku Aramanaiyile Poi, Raajaavin Sevigalukku Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Ariviththaargal.

21 appozhudhu Raajaa Andha Surulai Eduththukkonduvara Yegudhiyai Anuppinaan; Yegudhi Adhai Sambiradhiyaagiya Elisaamaavin Araiyilirundhu Eduththukkonduvandhu, Raajaa Ketkavum, Raajaavinidaththil Nindra Ellaap Prabukkalum Ketkavum Vaasiththaan.
22 onbadhaam Maadhaththile Raajaa, Kulirkaalaththukkuth Thangum Veettil Utkaarndhirundhaan; Avanukku Munbaagak Kanappu Moottiyirundhadhu.

23 yegudhi Moondru Naalu Paththigalai Vaasiththa Pinbu, Raajaa Oru Soorikkaththiyinaal Adhai Aruththu, Surulanaiththum Kanappilulla Akkiniyile Vendhu Pogumpadi, Kanappilirundha Akkiniyil Erindhupottaan.
24 raajaavaayinum, Andha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Ketta Avanudaiya Sagala Oozhiyakkaararaayinum Bayappadavumillai, Thangal Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkollavumillai.
25 elnaaththaanum, Thelaayaavum, Kemariyaavumo: Andha Surulai Sutterikka Vendaam Endru Raajaavinidaththil Vinnappampanninaargal; Aanaalum Avargalukku Avan Sevikodaamal,

26 paarukku Ennum Sambiradhiyaiyum Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyaiyum Pidikkumpadikku, Raajaa Ammelegin Kumaaranaagiya Yerameyelukkum, Asriyelin Kumaaranaagiya Seraayaavukkum, Aptheyelin Kumaaranaagiya Selemiyaavukkum Kattalai Koduththaan; Aanaalum Karththar Avargalai Maraiththaar.
27 raajaa Andha Surulaiyum, Adhile Eremiyaavin Vaai Sollap Paarukku Ezhudhiyirundha Vaarththaigalaiyum Sutteriththa Pinbu, Eremiyaavukkuk Karththarudaiyavaarththai Undaagi, Avar:
28 nee Thirumba Veroru Surulai Eduththu, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeem Sutteriththa Mudhalaam Surulilirundha Mundhina Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Adhile Ezhudhu Endraar.

29 melum Nee Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeemai Nokki: Baabilon Raajaa Nichchayamaai Varuvaan Enbadhaiyum, Avan Indha Dhesaththai Azhiththu Adhilirundhu Manusharaiyum Mirugangalaiyum Ozhiyappannuvaan Enbadhaiyum Nee Adhil Ezhudhinathedhendru Solli, Andha Surulai Nee Sutteriththaaye Endru Karththarsollugiraar.

30 aagaiyaal Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeemaik Kuriththu; Dhaaveedhin Singaasanaththinmel Utkaarumpadi Avan Vamsaththil Oruvanum Iraan; Avanudaiya Predhamovendraal, Pagalin Ushnaththukkum Iravin Kulirukkum Erindhuvidappattukkidakkum.

31 naan Avanidaththilum, Avan Sandhadhiyinidaththilum, Avan Prabukkalinidaththilum Avargal Akkiramaththai Visaariththu, Avanmelum Erusalemin Kudigalmelum, Yoodhaa Manusharmelum, Naan Avargalukku Sonnadhum, Avargal Kelaamarponadhumaana Theenganaiththaiyum Varappannuven Endru Karththarsollugiraar Endru Sol Endraar.

32 appozhudhu Eremiyaa Veroru Surulai Eduththu, Adhai Neriyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paarukku Ennum Sambiradhiyinidaththil Koduththaan; Avan Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeem Akkiniyaal Sutteriththa Pusthagaththin Vaarththaigalaiyellaam, Adhile Eremiyaavin Vaai Solla Ezhudhinaan; Innum Avaigalukkoththa Anegam Vaarththaigalum Avaigalode Serkkappattadhu.
